R

Ranking - Class in model
This class is used to store the infomation about a team and its ranking on the public leaderboard.

RegisterScreenView - Class in online.dwViews
Each HTML page that is specified in GameWebPagesResource first needs a class that extends View, which is Dropwizard's internal representation of the page.

Simple Constructor method, it simply specifies where the HTML page is to return.
